name: wonderpress-theme

scripts.postinstall: mkdir -p .wonderpress/archive && mv package.json .wonderpress/archive/package.json && mv .gitignore .wonderpress/archive/.gitignore && mv .wonderpress.package.json package.json && npx statickit . && npm uninstall -D @wndrfl/static-kit-cli && npm prune && mv .wonderpress/archive/.gitignore .gitignore

author: Johnnie Munger <johnnie@wonderful.io>
description: The official Wonderful boilerplate theme for WordPress.
